text:
You force the old gates open with a screech that echoes like thunder. Inside lies a courtyard littered with shattered helms and rusted blades. Statues watch from the battlements—some broken, others… subtly shifted since your last glance.

A figure emerges, clad in armor fused with flesh. It moves like a marionette, pulled by unseen chains. With a silent scream, it lunges. The gates slam shut behind you. Battle is unavoidable.
lore: The Rusted Gates are said to test those who pass, reanimating regrets into foes. Many warriors perish here, not from wounds, but from memories made manifest in steel.
